pageContent: Objectives: To investigate whether functionally based resistance exercise could improve strength, physical function, and disability among prostate cancer survivors (PCS) on androgen deprivation therapy (ADT); and to explore potential mediators of changes in outcomes from exercise.

metaData.source:
[Bone and Men's Health. Hormonal therapy and bone loss in prostate cancer]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/20118508/
